ThingDef.Name: EEG_CavalryHat
ThingDef.label: cavalry hat (blue)
ThingDef.description: The cavalry hat is a stylish and practical headgear option for your colonists. Crafted from durable materials and dyed a rich shade of blue, this hat is designed to provide protection from the sun, wind, and rain while also adding a touch of western flair to any outfit. With its wide brim and high crown, the cavalry hat offers ample coverage and ventilation, making it an ideal choice for long rides or outdoor work. The hat is designed to be comfortable and secure, with a snug fit and adjustable chin strap. Whether you're herding livestock, patrolling your settlement, or exploring the rimworld, the cavalry hat is a must-have accessory for any cowboy or cowgirl.

ThingDef.Name: EEG_Kepi
ThingDef.label: kepi (blue)
ThingDef.description: The Kepi is a stylish and practical headwear option for your colonists, inspired by the traditional military cap worn by soldiers in the 19th century. This particular Kepi is made from durable materials and comes in a deep blue color, lending it an air of sophistication and authority. With its flat, stiff brim and distinctive shape, the Kepi offers both protection from the sun and a unique, eye-catching look. The cap is designed to fit snugly on the head, with a strap to secure it in place during even the most intense activities. Whether worn as part of a uniform or as a standalone fashion statement, the Kepi is sure to make your colonists stand out from the crowd.
